H0.text: Which instrument plays the A note to which the orchestra tunes before a performance. Flute

H1.text: Which instrument plays the A note to which the orchestra tunes before a performance. Clarinet

H2.text: Which instrument plays the A note to which the orchestra tunes before a performance. Trumpet

H3.text: Which instrument plays the A note to which the orchestra tunes before a performance. OBOE

A4.text: Orchestras tune to a concert A played by the first oboe.

A5.text: The oboe is widely recognized as the instrument that tunes the orchestra with its distinctive 'A'.
